title: [Crash] Bugsplat on EVERY game load screen and can't enter game until it starts.
body: This happened occasionally before this most recent patch, but after this patch its EVERY time. 100%.

replies.body: Did you report the bugsplat by sending in the report? Did you also happen to get the bugsplat ID?

> [{quoted}](name=Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xmGBvOHl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-13T20:23:05.976+0000)
>
> Did you report the bugsplat by sending in the report? Did you also happen to get the bugsplat ID?

Any word on fixing the client issues everyone is having?

I had this same issue and it had to do with my Logitech files.  Have you tried deleting those?  I followed the directions below.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3571010

When it happened to me, it wasn't a bugsplat, the game would fail to connect because "There was no internet connection" (I was on a skype call with friends so I assure you I had connection).

I'd dismiss it as an hiccup on my ISP or something, but the problem was that the "bug" was quite persistent, it'd always say I wouldn't be able to connect UNTIL the game actually started, this happened without fail for a week or so, and then it simply went away.

I had this, it was fucking annoying.

It lasted for a week or so and then...Uh...It simply dissapeared, I didn't change anything, so uh...hang in there. 

Avoid playing Ranked, tho.
